Talk_01_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_00>But I will say, we're scouring high and low
for something here in the <clr:0000>Hebra region<clr:ffff>.

We searched most of the south, so now
we intend to go to the <clr:0000>north<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0100>If we meet again, we'll tell you <clr:0000>that<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>secret<clr:ffff>
of ours.

Well, see you!
Talk_01_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Heh, sorry. Forget you heard anything
about <clr:0000>that<clr:ffff>. Sis-<sp:5:1:0>ter<sp:5:1:0> se-<sp:5:1:0>cret!
Talk_01_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>C-could it be you have some brightcaps?!


<sp:3:0:2:0701>I really, really want <clr:0000>brightcaps<clr:ffff>, and
<clr:0000>10 <clr:ffff>of them would do the trick! Would
you...<sp:5:1:0>maybe give them to me?
Talk_00_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Come on, li'l sis... You can do it. I mean,
we traveled ALL this way. We need to
gather those <clr:0000>brightcaps<clr:ffff> inside at least.
That's what we came for, and you can
find them only in <clr:0000>caves<clr:ffff>!

<sp:3:0:2:0801>We made it here safe and sound.<sp:5:1:0> I can't
bear to leave until I have <clr:0000>10 <clr:ffff>of them.
Let's go in.<sp:5:1:0> Please, we've GOT to!
Talk_00_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Nat, please... I just can't do this. At least,
not with this cave.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>There are lots of other caves opened by
the Upheaval. Let's try a different one.

<sp:3:0:2:0300>This one is surely full of...<sp:5:1:0><clr:0000>creatures
different from anything we know<clr:ffff>, and I
was already itching to go home.
Talk_01_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Well, I can't blame you. Brightcaps are
beyond useful, and they're found growing
only in caves.
We've got to get some ourselves.
Talk_00_15: <sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive>Wait, what? No, we need to go together!
Talk_01_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Think_01>...Or maybe not. Looks like there's too
much in your pouch.

How about you make some room and
come talk to me again? <sp:5:1:0>You'll get a fresh
home-cooked meal out of it!
Talk_00_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>What did I do to deserve this? I'm just
the worst at dealing with monsters.
Talk_01_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Think_00>I wanted to give you a home-cooked meal
as thanks for those brightcaps.

But your pouch is still full!<sp:5:1:0> Can we talk
again after you sort your stuff?
Talk_00_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>We came all the way here together!<sp:5:1:0>
Let's go in! Come on!

I just want <clr:0000>10 brightcaps<clr:ffff>, that's all!<sp:5:1:0>
Then we can go! <sp:5:1:0>Please, please, please?
Talk_01_23: <sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>Made some room?<sp:5:1:0> Then here you go!
Talk_01_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive_00>Whoa, Nat. Has this guy caught your eye
or what?
Talk_01_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry_00>D-don't be ridiculous. That was just a
thanks for the brightcaps!
Talk_01_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>Yes, it IS amazing.<sp:5:0:0> Ooo, you love a good
cave, don't you? And so do I...

They can hold all sorts of wonderful
things.<sp:5:1:0> Alluring things. Valuable things!

Like the gems from <clr:0000>ore deposits<clr:ffff>,<sp:5:0:0>
<clr:0000>brightbloom seeds<clr:ffff> that illuminate dark
places,<sp:5:0:0> and brightcaps, of course!
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>So, you know...<sp:5:1:0>if you had enough of these
brightcaps, then maybe YOU could try...<sp:5:1:0>
you know...
Talk_01_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Tired_01>You're a lifesaver! Now I don't need to
go into that awful cave.

But I have to say, it's amazing that you
collected so many brightcaps. I mean,
they're found only in caves like this.
Talk_01_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_01>Er, <sp:5:0:0>Nat...<sp:5:1:0>you're not thinking about <clr:0000>that<clr:ffff>,
are you? And him?
Talk_01_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>Thank you! I don't expect them for
nothing, so here, I'll trade you this.
Talk_01_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>I'd never! Not <clr:0000>that<clr:ffff>. Unless,<sp:5:0:0> you
know, maybe...
Talk_01_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_01>But...


<sp:3:0:2:0701>If we meet again, it'd be fate, wouldn't it?
Then we'd HAVE to tell him.
